code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ManageRooms(){const[rooms,setRooms]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{API.get('rooms/').then(res=>setRooms(res.data)).catch(err=>{console.error("Failed to fetch rooms",err);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Manage Rooms"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginBottom:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn btn-pink",href:"/admin/add-room",children:"Add New Room"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{style:{listStyleType:'none',padding:0},children:rooms.map(room=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:room.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[room.location," (Capacity: ",room.capacity,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn btn-yellow",href:"/admin/edit-room/".concat(room.id),children:"Edit"}),' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn btn-green",href:"/admin/delete-room/".concat(room.id),children:"Delete"})]})},room.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn btn-yellow",href:"/admin/dashboard",children:"Back to Dashboard"})})]});}export default ManageRooms;
